title: Breaking a Couple in every World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Martial Arts   Mystery   School Life   Sci-fi   Slice of Life   Xuanhuan
tags: Confident Protagonist   Conflicting Loyalties   Cooking   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Familial Love   Family   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Lazy Protagonist   Reincarnation   Saving the World   Scientists   Shounen-Ai Subplot   System Administrator   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   World Hopping   World Travel   Younger Sisters
author: 忍者阿姨
description:
In every love story, there are one or two male and female matches who seek death. They wronged themselves, disgusted everyone, and fulfilled the hero and heroine.

Li Huairou's existence is to bring these men and women back from the edge of death, and watch the play at the same time..>
